summary: Completed testing of new PlayTraderz features: Notifications page, Seller public profile, and Password recovery flow. All backend APIs (14/14 tests) and frontend pages working correctly. Email integration with Brevo/Sendinblue confirmed working - actual emails sent successfully.
passed_tests: GET /api/notifications - requires auth (401)
GET /api/notifications - returns notifications list and unread_count
GET /api/notifications?limit=5 - respects limit parameter
POST /api/notifications/read-all - marks all as read
GET /api/users/seller/superadmin - returns public seller profile with listings/reviews
GET /api/users/seller/nonexistent - returns 404 for missing seller
GET /api/users/seller/testbuyer - returns 404 for non-seller user
POST /api/auth/password/forgot - works for existing email
POST /api/auth/password/forgot - returns 200 for non-existent email (no enumeration)
POST /api/auth/password/reset - rejects invalid token
POST /api/auth/password/reset - validates password strength
GET /api/users/me - requires auth
GET /api/users/me - returns user profile
Frontend - Forgot Password page loads correctly with email input and submit button
Frontend - Forgot Password form submission shows success state
Frontend - Reset Password page shows 'Invalid Link' when no token provided
Frontend - Reset Password page shows form when token in URL
Frontend - Reset Password validates and shows error for invalid token
Frontend - Seller Profile page shows username, level badge, rating, reviews, listings
Frontend - Notifications page loads (requires login), shows empty state correctly
Frontend - 'Forgot password?' link on login page navigates to /forgot-password
critical_code_review_comments: Email service properly configured with Brevo/Sendinblue - real emails delivered
Password reset prevents email enumeration by returning 200 for all requests
Seller profile correctly fetches by username instead of ID
All data-testid attributes present in UI components for testing
Proper error handling in Reset Password page for missing/invalid tokens
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing test users
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features (Notifications, Seller Profile, Password Recovery) all working. Email via Brevo is REAL - not mocked. Emails confirmed sent in backend logs. Seller profile accessible at /seller/{username}. Password reset flow: /forgot-password -> email sent -> /reset-password?token=xxx -> password updated.

email_integration.note: Real emails being delivered via Brevo API (xkeysib-* key)
